text:
Helloooo....
I've been stuck on this part for far too long than I'd like to admit...

My code looks exactly like yours (screenshot), yet the modules still don't appear in a row (they are stacked on top of each other, rather than side-by-side).

May I please ask for help? Am I missing something?

Is this achieved through CSS? If so, which element do we target for display: flex? :pray::slightly_smiling_face: Thank you!
